title: Donâ€™t Stop
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I can feel the night time coming, hold on
I can feel my resistance falling, hold on
Don't you know baby you got it
This hold on me
But I love just what you're doing
Oh you're all I need
When I'm dancing with you girl
With the lights down low
The power you possess
You know I can't let go
Oh listen to me
[Chorus]
Don't stop moving, baby
Tonight's the night
Don't stop moving baby
It'll be alright
[Verse 2]
Can't you feel the fire burning?
It feels so right
Oh can't you feel my body yearning?
Hold me tight
Don't hold back, keep rising
Girl can't you see
All I need is your sweet loving
Oh to satisfy me
When you move girl on the floor
The magic's in your eyes, baby
You know you turn me on
You've got me hypnotized
Oh let me tell you

[Chorus] X2
Don't stop moving, baby
Tonight's the night
Don't stop moving baby
It'll be alright
[Bridge]
Oh, it's you for me, everything I want
Everything I need
We are lucky to feel
What we feel tonight
All the love that's been together
Tonight's the night
[Chorus]
Don't stop moving, baby
Tonight's the night
Don't stop moving baby
It'll be alright
[Outro]
Don't stop
I said don't stop
Baby, don't stop
Don't stop
Baby, please, don't stop
Baby, don't stop[repeat until fade]
